title.rendered: See Falanx’s John Blamire and Mike Read at the UK Investor Show

content.rendered:
Falanx’s COO and Founder, John Blamire will be presenting at the UK Investor Show on 21st April at Queen Elizabeth II Centre in London. John will be discussing the latest developments in the cyber security market and why investors should be excited about what’s ahead for the Falanx Group.

After the success of 2017’s five ‘Dragon’s Den’ sessions, a number of CEOs will be pitching to three Dragons for a £3,000 stock investment. Falanx Chairman and CEO, Mike Read, will be delivering his 1 minute pitch at 4.01pm on the main stage.

For more information on the UK Investor Show, please visit: http://ow.ly/rDVi30jtfIN
